summary: While the government allocated over Rs 1 million for renovating the landmark before the Saarc Summit, only around Rs 400,000 was used. “Hence, we have requested the government to allow us to use the remaining amount for an extensive landscaping,” KMC chief Dhana Bahadur Shrestha said. The KMC spent only around Rs 30 million on the musical fountain though the government allocated around Rs 32 million for the same. “We also want to use the remaining amount for the new project,” Shrestha said.
title: kmc-to-landscape-ranipokhari
